    • generateEnemy

      public Enemy generateEnemy(GamePanel map)
      It generates enemy randomly on the map. It also makes sure that each enemy has different location than any other enemies.
      Parameters:
      map - the game panel where enemies need to be generated
      Returns:
      Enemy that has been created
